thread.title: Gov. Abbott Threatens to “Bring the Hammer Down” on Dallas After They Threaten to Become Sanctuary City
thread.title_full: Gov. Abbott Threatens to “Bring the Hammer Down” on Dallas After They Threaten to Become Sanctuary City

author: K. Campbell
title: Gov. Abbott Threatens to “Bring the Hammer Down” on Dallas After They Threaten to Become Sanctuary City
text:
Fallen Marine Nominated For 4th Time May Finally Get Medal Of Honor 
“I refuse to stand by & let this misguided, lawless resolution undermine our nation’s laws and endanger our families,” he wrote. I refuse to stand by & let this misguided, lawless resolution undermine our nation's laws and endanger our families. https://t.co/9aZQOukiyx 
— Pete Sessions (@PeteSessions) February 8, 2017 
Other Dallas County officials were confident that the resolution carried no legal weight, and ensured that the county was compliant with ICE requests, according to Newsmax . 
While the Texas state government threatens to “bring down the hammer” on any county or community that refuses to enforce immigration law or cooperate with federal immigration officials, President Trump has similarly threatened to the same at the federal level. 
Immigration laws exist for good reasons — to protect our national security and ensure that harmful people, weapons and drugs aren’t flooded into our communities. Political figures who refuse to enforce those laws don’t have their citizens’ best interests at heart. 
Fortunately, we have leaders like Gov. Abbott who aren’t afraid to stand up for what is right and use their authority to protect the country in every way possible. 
Like and share this article on Facebook and Twitter if you’re glad to see Gov. Abbott standing up against Texas officials who refuse to enforce immigration laws. What do you think officials should do about cities that refuse to enforce immigration laws? Scroll down to comment below! Advertisement Popular Right Now
